title: SITMOD Gaming Chairs for Adults with Footrest-Computer Ergonomic Video Game Chair-Backrest and Seat Height Adjustable Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support(Gray)-Fabric
descriptions:
### SITMOD Gaming Chairs for Adults with Footrest - Ergonomic Video Game Chair (Gray, Fabric)

**Product Overview:**

Elevate your gaming and work experience with the SITMOD Gaming Chair, designed to provide unparalleled comfort and support. This chair is perfect for long gaming sessions or intense work hours, thanks to its ergonomic design and a range of adjustable features. The sleek gray fabric exterior not only adds a stylish touch to your setup but also ensures durability and easy maintenance.

**Key Features:**

- **Ergonomic Design:** High-back ergonomic design with a soft, high-density thicken sponge seat cushion for maximum comfort and support.
- **Recline Range:** Adjust the backrest from 90° to 150° to find the perfect angle for relaxing or intense activities.
- **360° Swivel:** Effortlessly rotate in any direction for easy access to your desk or gaming setup.
- **Adjustable Lumbar and Headrest:** Customize the lumbar and headrest supports to fit your body perfectly, reducing strain and improving posture.
- **Retractable Footrest:** Extend the footrest for added relaxation or retract it for a more traditional seating position.
- **Upholstered Armrests:** Comfortable, upholstered armrests that can be adjusted to your preferred height and angle.
- **Height Adjustment:** The seat height can be adjusted by 3.2 inches to accommodate users of different heights.
- **High Weight Capacity:** Supports up to 300 lbs, making it suitable for a wide range of users.
- **Durable Construction:** Built with a solid thick steel frame and heavy-duty nylon base for long-lasting stability and durability.
- **Certifications:** SGS certified 4-level cylinder ensures safety and reliability.

**Dimensions:**

- **Overall Dimensions:** 23 inches (W) x 20 inches (D) x 49-52 inches (H)
- **Seat Panel:** 20.5 inches (W) x 20.8 inches (D)
- **Back Panel:** 22 inches (W) x 32.6 inches (H)

**Materials:**

- **Frame:** Solid thick steel
- **Base:** Heavy-duty nylon
- **Fabric:** Carbon fiber and fabric blend for a modern, durable finish
- **Cushion:** High-density thicken sponge

**Suitability:**

- Ideal for gaming and office work, providing both comfort and style.

**Customer Satisfaction:**

- **Warranty:** Enjoy a satisfaction guarantee with a return policy that allows returns with no questions asked.
- **Support:** Contact us for any questions or to request free part replacements.

**Assembly Required:**

- Some assembly is required to set up the chair. Detailed instructions are included for a smooth setup process.

**Why Choose SITMOD?**

The SITMOD Gaming Chair is more than just a chair; it's a statement of style and comfort. Whether you're a dedicated gamer or a professional looking for a high-quality office chair, the SITMOD chair offers the perfect blend of functionality and aesthetics. Invest in your comfort and productivity today!

**Order Now** and experience the ultimate in ergonomic seating.
